info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALEXANDER AND CENTRAL IREDELL COUNTIES UNTIL 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 7 miles east of Taylorsville, or near Stony Point, moving southeast at 10 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Statesville, Stony Point, Love Valley, Hiddenite, Turnersburg, Scotts and Millersville. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
